name: Honorbound (itch)
description:
Roguelike RPG game that I'm working on building in unreal engine. 

Every demo will be completely free to play until an eventual release. 

The roguelike elements are not implemented yet, and most of the content I want to implement is not there yet. 

This is quite an ambitious project, and the only support I can ask for right now is feedback on the systems that are already implemented. Join the discord here https://discord.gg/XWFnPeSUKH

Thank you for visiting this page!
